articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by State Merited Chorus
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by Merited State Chorus
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a performance given by the Merited State Chorus on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 Put on the stage were male choruses "Cantata to Marshal Kim Il Sung" and "Song of National Defence", male solos and male choruses "A Soldier's Wish" and 'My Song in the Trench", female solo and male chorus "Nobody Knows", orchestral music and chorus "Mungyong Pass" and other numbers.
					
					 The performers enthusiastically sang of the shining feats of the KPA and the people who demonstrated the dignity and the spirit of heroic Korea before the whole world by beating back the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces and honorably defending the freedom and independence of the country under the wise guidance of the Party and the leader. 
					
					 They also vividly represented the firm faith, indomitable will and militant stamina of the servicepersons and the people of the DPRK to accomplish the Juche revolutionary cause started in Mt. Paektu and build a great prosperous powerful socialist nation on this land under the leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 He congratulated the artistes on their successful performance and warmly waved back to the enthusiastically cheering audience. 
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the artistes staged a performance high in ideological contents and artistry as it is replete with the revolutionary soldier spirit.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that they would conduct revolutionary and militant performing activities to powerfully encourage the servicepersons and the people to win fresh victories just as they did in those days of the war when they inspired the soldiers fighting on heights despite a hail of bullets and shells to perform exploits. 
					
					Among the audience were KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA General Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, first vice director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, and other commanding officers of the KPA, Secretaries of the C.C., the WPK Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam, department directors of the C.C., the WPK, and Kang Sok Ju, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and other leading officials.

articles.title: Majon Hotel Completed
articles.content:
Majon Hotel Completed
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Modern Majon Hotel sprang up at the Majon recreation ground in Hamhung City, a good destination of holiday makers.
					The hotel has all modern cultural and welfare facilities such as bedrooms of various sizes and styles, restaurants, indoor swimming pool, saunas and bath facilities. It has also a bathing resort. This is another edifice to be proud of in the era of Songun, a product of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's love for the people as he has always worked hard to provide people with better conditions for their recreation.
					
					 A ceremony for the completion of the hotel was held on the spot on Monday. 
					
					 Present there were Premier Kim Yong Il, Minister of the People's Armed Forces Kim Yong Chun, Secretaries of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Choe Thae Bok and  Kim Ki Nam, department directors of the C.C., WPK, officials concerned and employees of the hotel.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam in his speech at the ceremony underscored the need for the staff of the hotel to steadily improve the service so that Kim Jong Il's boundless love may reach people as quickly as possible. 
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants looked round the interior and exterior of the hotel.

articles.title: Int'l Architectural Book Exhibition to Open Here
articles.content:
Int'l Architectural Book Exhibition to Open Here
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang International Architectural Book Exhibition will be held at the Grand People's Study House here between August 3 and 5.
					It will bring together more than 20 organizations of different countries, international organizations and overseas compatriots. Valuable books and data on the latest science and technology in the field of architecture will be on display there. 
					
					 The exhibition will provide a good opportunity to boost  the exchange and cooperation among countries in the field of architecture and promote its development.

articles.title: Rhythmic Gymnastics International Judge's Course Held
articles.content:
Rhythmic Gymnastics International Judge's Course Held
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The 12th Cycle Rhythmic Gymnastics International Judge's Course was held in the Table-Tennis Gymnasium in Chongchun Street of DPRK for five days.
					 It was attended by officials concerned and coaches of sports teams and rhythmic gymnastic experts in Pyongyang.
					
					 The course, given by Tamara Bompa (Canadian), an A-grade judge of rhythmic gymnastics of the International Gymnastics Federation, was held, divided into theoretical and practical ones.
					
					 The theoretical course dealt with newly changed rules and other matters that rhythmic gymnastics judges must know.
					
					 The practical course was conducted in such a way as cementing with the help of video tapes what the participants had learnt in the theoretical one.
					
					 A qualification test for international judges was also held during the course.

articles.title: Large Dictionary of Chinese Characters Published
articles.content:
Large Dictionary of Chinese Characters Published
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The National Classics Institute of the Academy of Social Sciences of the DPRK has recently brought out the Large Dictionary of Chinese Characters.
					The researchers of the institute studied and analyzed hundreds of classical documents published at home and abroad including Rijo Sillok (Chronicles of the Ri Dynasty) and the 80,000 Blocks of the Complete Collection of Buddhist Scriptures. On this basis, they collected more than 308,500 vocabularies and more than 600,000 examples to compile the large dictionary which can be used as Chinese-character wordbook and dictionary at the same time.
					
					The dictionary of ten volumes gives tens of thousands of Chinese characters as entry characters and hundreds of thousands of the words written in Chinese characters as entry vocabularies which are used in the linguistic life of the Korean people and the national classics.
					
					The dictionary firmly maintains the Juche character and principle of historicism in the selection of entry characters and vocabularies and their interpretation, ensures scientific accuracy and popularity and gives possible origin of words and correct examples.
					
					For the sake of convenience of readers in finding the entry characters and vocabularies easily, the dictionary from volume one to nine arranges the entry characters according to radical and in line with the number of strokes in the same radical and in the Korean alphabetical order in the same number of strokes.
					
					And the tenth volume contains radical index and strokes order index so as to find the entry characters and entry vocabularies in various ways.
					
					The publication of the grand dictionary has laid a solid scientific foundation for successfully arranging the valuable national classical legacies created by the Korean people and studying in depth and systemizing history, folklore and histories of other fields.

articles.title: War Victory Day Celebrated in DPRK
articles.content:
War Victory Day Celebrated in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The 56th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War was significantly celebrated in different parts of the DPRK.
					 The Mansudae Art Troupe, the State Folk Art Troupe and the State Symphony Orchestra gave art performances and concert at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre, the Central Youth Hall and the Moranbong Theatre.
					
					 Put on their stages were orchestra "Cantata to Marshal Kim Il Sung", chorus "Our Victory-Day July 27", male chorus "Song of National Defence", mixed quintet "Oh, My Motherland of Songun" and other numbers. Among them were hymns in high praise of the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung who won the great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and the heroic feats of the Korean army and people.
					
					The performers loudly sang of the history of war victory, a shining result of the wise leadership of the President, and well represented the firm faith and will of the servicepersons and the people of the DPRK to always win victory, closely rallied around General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Artistes of the State Theatrical Troupe, the Pyongyang Circus and the Pyongyang Moranbong Circus staged story-telling and acrobatic performances full of revolutionary optimism, emotion and militant stamina, delighting citizens of Pyongyang on the V-day.
					
					  There was also a celebration art performance of war veterans in the city.
					
					 Meanwhile, celebration performances of artistes were given at art theatres and cultural houses in local areas including Jagang and South Hwanghae provinces.
					
					 There were the performance of choruses "We Will Uphold My Motherland of Songun with Iron and Steel" by discharged soldiers at the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex and art performance and oratorical contest of war veterans and trade union officials and members in South Hamgyong Province.
					
					 Women's union members in South Phyongan and North Hamgyong provinces arranged a celebration performance and a stage of wartime songs displaying the indomitable fighting spirit of the Korean women.
					
					 In Sinuiju there was "The Victory Day July 27 Is Everlasting under the Leadership of the Brilliant Commander of Songun", an art performance given by working people and school youth and children to celebrate the war victory day.
					
					 Working people in the city of Wonsan held stage of wartime songs "We Will Emerge Victorious" to enjoy the holiday amid joy and emotion.

articles.title: S. Korea's "White Paper on Unification" Termed Hypocritical
articles.content:
S. Korea's "White Paper on Unification" Termed Hypocritical
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The "2009 white paper on unification" recently published by the gentries of the south Korean "Ministry of Unification" is a hypocritical document as it justified their treacherous and anti-reunification policy for confrontation with fellow countrymen and distorted the catastrophic phase of the inter-Korean relations, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a signed commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The south Korean ruling quarters should have apologized for the crimes committed by them against national reunification. However, they are so brazen-faced as to let loose such rhetoric as "efforts" and "adjustment" in a bid to mislead public opinion. This is the height of shamelessness. 
					
					 From the outset of its office the Lee Myung Bak group brought forward an anti-reunification proposal for confrontation such as "no nukes, opening and 3,000 U.S. dollars," pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, and thus upset overnight the inter-Korean relations which had developed in favor of national reconciliation, unity and reunification through an all-out offensive for confrontation with it. This is universally known. 
					
					 With nothing can the Lee group justify its despicable history woven with crimes against reunification or conceal its vicious nature of blatantly challenging the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 The Lee group described 2008 as a "period of adjustment to establish new inter-Korean relations". This is nothing but a ridiculous jargon of a thief crying "Stop the thief!" This is evidenced by the present reality in which the inter-Korean relations are in the worst phase since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and manifold ordeals and difficulties are lying in the way of national reunification, the greatest desire of the nation.
					
					 Facts patently prove that the Lee group only seeks to realize its criminal ambition to stifle fellow countrymen and achieve "unification through the invasion of the north", backed by the United States, utterly indifferent to the efforts to improve the  inter-Korean relations and achieve peaceful reunification.

articles.title: Japan's "White Paper on Defense for 2009" Slammed
articles.content:
Japan's "White Paper on Defense for 2009" Slammed
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries recently made public a "white paper on defense for 2009" in which they termed the DPRK "a serious threat" to Japan and disclosed their scenario to seize Tok Islet. This patently proves that their hostile policy towards the DPRK and ambition for reinvasion have reached an extreme phase.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 Recalling that they, blaming the DPRK's "nuclear program" for self-defence in the white paper, claimed this was a "factor of threat that seriously infringes" upon the peace and security in Northeast Asia and the international community, the commentary goes on:
					
					 This is another unpardonable grave provocation to the DPRK as it is a revelation of their bitter hostility towards Pyongyang. 
					
					 It is well known that Japan, a war criminal state, has again emerged a dangerous force of a war in Asia by seeking its militarist ambition. 
					
					 Japan's escalated moves for militarization and reinvasion are rendering the regional situation tenser and increasing the danger of a war in Asia, putting the peaceful environment of the neighboring countries at peril. The DPRK, in particular, is exposed to a grave threat due to Japan's sinister hostile policy towards it and Tokyo's moves for reinvasion. It is preposterous, therefore, for Japan to raise a hue and cry over the "threat" from the DPRK as it is nothing but a cynical ploy to justify Tokyo's militarist moves.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that the Japanese reactionaries again claimed in the white paper that Tok Islet, part of the inviolable territory of Korea, belongs to Japan. 
					
					 The above-said lie told by them only betrays their sinister intention to seize it anytime. It is inveterate disposition and bad habit of Japan to tell lies, fabricate cases and perpetrate aggression and plunder.
					
					 But the Japanese reactionaries are sadly mistaken. They had better properly know who their rival is and discard brigandish temper.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Assails Japan's Frantic Moves for Overseas Aggression
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Assails Japan's Frantic Moves for Overseas Aggression
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The Japanese militarist fanatics had better behave themselves, mindful that Hinomaru would be thrown into a dumping ground as a flag of the defeated country and Kimigayo prove to a dirge for it should they rush headlong into overseas aggression. Rodong Sinmun Tuesday warns this in a signed article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Late in the 1990s the Japanese reactionary ruling quarters designated Hinomaru and Kimigayo, synonyms for aggression, war, genocide, plunder and destruction, as an official national flag and song. They are now using them for inciting militarism on a legitimate basis and launching overseas aggression in real earnest. 
					
					 Since the outset of the new century Japan has frantically stepped up militarization under the zealous support and patronage of its U.S. master and intensified the overseas advance of the "Self-Defense Forces" (SDF) and military operations in combat areas.
					
					 The Defense Agency was upgraded to a ministry, the plan for establishing a missile defense system zealously pushed forward, an operation commanding system of the SDF was set up to wage a modern warfare and Japan's plan for the militarization of space has reached a phase of its implementation, etc. All these moves patently show what phase the Japanese militarists' reinvasion hysteria has reached. 
					
					 Under the showy signboard of "contribution to peace," the Japanese reactionaries adopted various war legislations, paving a wide avenue for the SDF's overseas military operations.
					
					 They have gone the lengths of openly disclosing their scenario for making a preemptive strike at the "missile launching base" of the DPRK.
					
					 By forcing Japanese to hoist Hinomaru and sing Kimigayo, they seek to infuse into the Japanese youth and children sort of pride of the Japanese imperialists' history of aggression, nostalgia about militarism and determination to retrieve the defeat they suffered in the past. They are putting visits to "Yasukuni Shrine" on a regular and popular basis and busy distributing reactionary films and publications and other propaganda materials in a bid to turn Japanese society to the Right and militarize it.
					
					 It is a matter of time that the Japanese militarists revived and rearmed will embark upon the road of Asian reinvasion flying Hinomaru and singing Kimigayo.
					
					 However, the Japanese reactionaries should draw a proper lesson from the history of the defeat suffered by the Japanese imperialists in the past.
					
					 Gone are the days in the 20th century when they went on the rampage in the world, chanting the slogan of "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere." 
					
					 If the Japanese reactionaries launch overseas aggression at any cost, they will meet only a miserable end.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Thorough Implementation of Songun Politics
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Thorough Implementation of Songun Politics
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) --The Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea serves as a banner for eternal victory and prosperity of the DPRK and the nation and a powerful weapon for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The WPK's Songun politics serves as an invincible treasured sword for successfully meeting the essential requirements for the independent development of the nation by building matchless military power, a powerful weapon for laying the most solid socio-political base for the future development of the nation and an advantageous political mode as it makes a history of creations and changes for the country's eternal prosperity and the happiness of the people.
					
					 The WPK has built up the invincible revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu and established an independent, modern and powerful defence industry for the fundamental interests of the people and the future of the nation, holding aloft the banner of Songun. 
					
					 Today the DPRK can be proud of the fact that it provided a firm military guarantee for beating back any invasion by the enemies and ensuring the independent development of posterity. 
					
					  It is thanks to the WPK's Songun politics that the single-minded unity of all the servicepersons and people and the great unity between the army and the people have grown a thousand times stronger at a new higher stage. The imperialists are intensifying the dastardly operations for ideological and cultural poisoning and psychological warfare to benumb the consciousness of the 3rd, 4th and 5th generations for the Korean revolution, but this is nothing but a pipe dream.
					
					 The WPK's line of economic construction in the Songun era which calls for giving priority to the development of the defence industry while simultaneously developing light industry and agriculture is a just line of economic construction which meets the requirements of the Songun politics. It is the most just line of economic construction as it makes it possible to give play to the might of the of the DPRK's economic structure with main emphasis on defence industry and heavy industry and ensure the rapid development of all other fields  with it as a driving force. The validity of this line is proved with added clarity as the days go by. 
					
					The Songun politics reflects the clairvoyant wisdom of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who foresees far distant future of the country and his courageous mettle of carving out its morrow with strong faith of independence and pluck. It also reflects his personality as a great man as he has always provided rich and prosperous future, firmly believing in the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Songun is so deeply rooted in the minds of the servicepersons and the people that it is inseparable from socialism in the DPRK.
					
					 For the Korean people Songun means independence, dignity, future and a banner for the prosperity of the generations to come.
					
					 It is the firm faith and will of the army and people in the DPRK to wage a more dynamic struggle, true to the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il, and thus bring earlier the day when the shouts of hurrah for the victory in the drive for building a great prosperous powerful nation will resound forth on this land.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Beg War Equipment
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Beg War Equipment
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- It has been disclosed that the south Korean puppet warmongers asked the United States for sale of eight MH-60S helicopters and the mine detection system, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The U.S. Defense Department confirmed this fact on July 23.
					
					  A relevant section under the department briefed Congress on the said sale proposal on July 17, and the proposal is now under examination at Congress, it was reported.
					
					 The south Korean puppet warmongers are now busy with purchase of equipment for paving up the route of attack in the sea while repeating such war outbursts as "third skirmish in the west sea". This goes to clearly show how amuck they are running to prepare a new war.

articles.title: Settlement of Crisis of Ssangyong Motor Co. Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Settlement of Crisis of Ssangyong Motor Co. Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- A "rally of workers from across south Korea calling for the settlement of the crisis of Ssangyong Motor Co." was held in Kyonggi Province of south Korea on July 25. 
					 Present there were more than 10,000 unionists affiliated to the Confederation of Trade Unions from different parts of south Korea and members of civic and public organizations and opposition parties.
					
					 Speakers at the rally noted that the unionists of Ssangyong Motor Co. are staging the fierce struggle for their right to existence, getting ready for death while going on the strike.
					
					 Charging that the Lee Myung Bak group is making desperate efforts to kill the workers in the struggle en masse by mobilizing the police forces and gangsters, they stated that they would no longer allow the dictatorial "government" to trample down them.
					
					 The fascist police are staging a murderous drill there to commit the second Ryongsan tragedy, they pointed out, calling upon the people from all walks of life to fight in solidarity till the demands of the Ssangyong Motor unionists have been met.
					
					 After the rally, its participants staged a demonstration.
					
					 The fascist police made double and treble rings of more than 12,500 policemen of 117 companies and at least 100 combatant police buses in a bid to block up the workers' struggle, while creating an atmosphere of violent repression.
					
					 The demonstrators waged a sit-in strike, attempting to advance into the spot of the unionists' strike in defiance of the police suppression.
					
					 In another development, the families of the Ssangyong Motor unionists occupied the office of the "Grand National Party" in Youido, Seoul, on July 24 and entered a sit-in strike there.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Railroading of Evil Bill Censured
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Railroading of Evil Bill Censured
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- A candlelight rally was held in Seoul on July 25 to denounce the puppet Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for having railroaded the evil bill on media through the "National Assembly".
					 Attending it were at least 20,000 members of organizations of all levels including the Solidarity for Progress, the Federation of Peasants Associations, the Council of Professors for Democracy, the People's Council for Public Welfare and Democracy and the Civic and Public Organizations Network for Defending Democracy and Checking Suppression under the Pretext of Security and opposition parties.
					
					 Speakers at the rally recalled that the "Grand National Party" abused its power to railroad the "bill on media" through the NA by illegal "revoting" and "voting by proxy" on July 22, declaring it completely null and void and invalid.
					
					 The lawmakers who took part in ramming the evil bill through the NA are no more than marionettes of plutocrats, Chosun Ilbo, Choongang Ilbo and Dong-A Ilbo, they charged.
					
					 They called upon all the people to fight at the cost of their lives to achieve democracy and get the evil law repealed.
					
					 The "6-Point People's Declaration" released at the rally stated the participants could never recognize the above-said evil law, pointing out that the people would launch an all-people campaign to get the evil law scrapped and achieve democracy in unity.
					
					 The declaration called for branding the legislators from the GNP who took the lead in railroading the evil law through NA as "arch criminal responsible for the evil law on media" and demanded they be severely punished.
					
					 The declaration noted that they would take all opportunities such as the upcoming "National Assembly by-election" and "election to local assemblies" for sternly judging the treacherous regime by concerted efforts.

articles.title: DPRK's War Victory Day Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
DPRK's War Victory Day Celebrated in Russia
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Moscow on July 24 to celebrate the 56th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Attending it were officials of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Soviet Union and the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK and popular masses.
					
					 Present there on invitation were staff members of the DPRK embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 Veredin, secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Soviet Union, said that the Korean people won the great victory of world-wide significance in the Fatherland Liberation War under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung. The war clearly proved that no force on earth would bring to their knees the Korean people guided by the great leadership, he stressed.
					
					 Petrov, secretary of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, said that the Korean army and people under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, the great brilliant commander, have become powerful beyond comparison of their might in the 1950s. If the U.S. persists in its policy of aggression on the DPRK, it will suffer only disgrace and defeat, he warned.
					
					 Nikolayev, secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Soviet Union, said that the Korean people's history of invincibility will go on as they are under the distinguished leadership of Kim Jong Il who fully inherited the qualification and traits of the President.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Solidarity with Korean People Expressed in Austria
articles.content:
Solidarity with Korean People Expressed in Austria
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- A solidarity meeting took place in Austria on July 11 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 Oliver Jonischkeit, federal secretary of the Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation, and other speakers revealed the true colors of the U.S. imperialists as the provoker of the Korean War and noted that under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung the Korean army and people repelled the U.S. imperialists' armed invasion and achieved the brilliant victory.
					
					 They strongly demanded that the U.S. forces be withdrawn from south Korea and the Lee Myung Bak group immediately stop its crackdown upon the progressive organizations and people in the struggle for democracy of the society and the reunification of Korea and set free the arrested patriots at once.
					
					 A letter to the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea from the Federal Leadership of the Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 Pointing out that the U.S. imperialists have posed threat to peace and security of the Korean Peninsula, keeping their aggression armed forces in south Korea and conducting large-scale joint military exercises when all the Korean people are striving for peaceful reunification, the letter expressed full support for all the measures taken by the DPRK to defend the sovereignty of the country.

articles.title: Children Are King in DPRK
articles.content:
Children Are King in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung attended an opening ceremony of the Pyongyang Students and Children's Palace on September 30, Juche 52 (1963).
					 He, absorbed in thought, commanding the night scene of Pyongyang from a balcony of the palace, elaborated on the issues arising in managing the palace and talked about what happened when he met a delegate from a capitalist country.
					
					 The delegate told me the name "palace" was very good, the President said, adding he talked to him that the children were "heavenly king" in our country. And he stressed that the children are king in our country.
					
					 These teachings made the officials deeply feel the noble outlook on the rising generation of the President who greatly valued and loved the children, regarding them as the most precious beings in the world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion del Coro Benemerito por 27 de Julio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion del Coro Benemerito por 27 de julio
Pyongyang, 28 de julio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio la funcion festiva del Coro Estatal Benemerito por el 56o aniversario de la victoria en la gran Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (27 de julio de 1953).
					Entre las piezas interpretadas en la ocasion figuraron el coro masculino "Al mariscal            Kim Il Sung" y "Cancion de la defensa de la Patria", el solo y coro masculino "Deseo del combatiente" y "Mi cancion en la trinchera", el solo femenino y coro masculino "Nadie lo sabe", la musica orquestal y coro "Paso de montana Mungyong", etc.
					
					A traves del espectaculo, los ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico de los orgullosos meritos del EPC y el pueblo coreano que pusieron de pleno manifiesto la dignidad y el temperamento de la Corea heroica al defender honrosamente la soberania y la libertad de la patria derrotando bajo la destacada direccion del Partido y el Lider a las fuerzas aliadas imperialistas acaudilladas por Estados Unidos.
					
					Igualmente, demostraron patentemente la ferrea conviccion, la indoblegable voluntad y el temperamento combativo del ejercito y el pueblo de coronar la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en el monte Paektu y edificar en la tierra patria una gran potencia prospera socialista siguiendo al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					El Dirigente felicito a los ejecutantes por la exitosa funcion y saludo cordialmente a los espectadores que le aclamaban apasionadamente.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que los artistas del Coro Estatal Benemerito ofrecieron esta magnifica funcion de gran valor ideo-artistico en que se palpita el espiritu revolucionario de los militares.
					
					Expreso su gran esperanza y conviccion de que ellos estimularian mucho al ejercito y al pueblo a las nuevas victorias mediante sus actividades artisticas revolucionarias y combativas como aquellos dias de la gran Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria cuando llamaban a los soldados a la creacion de meritos ofreciendo funciones al pie de las cotas en combate bajo la avalancha de balas.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, submariscal del EPC, Kim Yong Chun, el jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, general de ejercito del EPC, Ri Yong Ho, el primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, general de ejercito del EPC, Kim Jong Gak, y otros comandantes del ejercito, los secretarios del CC del PTC, Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, el primer vicecanciller Kang Sok Ju y otros cuadros directivos.

articles.title: Inaugurado Hotel Majon
articles.content:
Inaugurado Hotel Majon
Pyongyang, 28 de julio (ATCC) -- Fue construido nuevamente el moderno Hotel Majon en el lugar de recreo homonimo en la ciudad de Hamhung.
					Estan acondicionados en nivel supremo los dormitorios de diversos tamanos y formas, el comedor, la piscina bajo techo, la sauna, el bano y otras instalaciones culturales y de servicio publico, para no hablar de la playa.
					
					El Hotel se trata de orgullosa creacion de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar) construida por el amor al pueblo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien se preocupa siempre para ofrecerle las condiciones culturales y de descanso mas excelentes.
					
					La ceremonia inaugural tuvo lugar la vispera en el mismo lugar.
					
					En la ocasion participaron el premier del Consejo de Ministros, Kim Yong Il, el ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, Kim Yong Chun, los secretarios del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC y otros funcionarios, asi como los empleados del Hotel.
					
					En el discurso de apertura, Kim Ki Nam subrayo que los servidores del Hotel deben mejorar sin cesar sus actividades para que el pueblo sienta bien ilimitado amor del Dirigente a si mismo.
					
					Terminada la ceremonia, los participantes recorrieron el interior y el exterior del Hotel.

articles.title: Celebraciones del 27 de julio en distintas localidades de Corea
articles.content:
Celebraciones del 27 de julio en distintas localidades de Corea
  Pyongyang, 28 de julio (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar a lo largo del pais las celebraciones del dia de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (27 de julio de 1953).
					  En el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este, la Casa Central de la Juventud y el Teatro Moranbong tuvieron lugar la funcion de cantos y bailes y el concierto ofrecidos por el Conjunto Artistico Mansudae, el Conjunto Nacional de Arte Tradicional y la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional.
					
					  En las ocasiones fueron presentadas la musica orquestal "Al mariscal Kim Il Sung",  el coro "27 de Julio, dia de la victoria", el coro masculino "Cancion de la defensa de la Patria" y el quinteto mixto "Mi patria del Songun (priorizacion militar)" y otras piezas que elogiaban las inmortales hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung, artifice del gran triunfo en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, y los meritos heroicos del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					  Los ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico la historia del triunfo en la guerra, producto de la sabia direccion del Presidente, y reflejaron bien la firme conviccion y voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de avanzar siempre victoriosos uniendose monoliticamente en torno al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					  Mientras tanto, el Conjunto Dramatico Nacional, el Conjunto Circense de Pyongyang y el Conjunto Circense Moranbong de Pyongyang ofrecieron las funciones de las piezas del arte de hablar y las acrobaticas, marcadas por el optimismo y sentimiento revolucionarios y el impetu combativo, alegrando mucho a los capitalinos que celebran el dia de la victoria.
					
					  Los veteranos de guerra en la ciudad de Pyongyang montaron tambien las escenas festivas.
					
					  Por otra parte, tuvieron lugar las funciones de festejo en los teatros artisticos y las casas culturales en distintas localidades del pais incluyendo las provincias de Jagang y de Hwanghae del Sur.
					
					  En particular, resultaron espectaculares el coro "Sostengamos con acero a mi patria del Songun" ofrecido por los ex militares ubicados en el Complejo Siderurgico Hwanghae, la funcion artistica y certamenes de oratoria de los veteranos de guerra, los funcionarios y miembros de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea en la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur.
					
					  Entretanto, las miembros de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea en la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur y la de Hamgyong del Norte ofrecieron la funcion artistica y la escena de canciones creadas en el tiempo de guerra que muestran los aspectos de indoblegable lucha de las coreanas.
					
					  Los trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares de la ciudad de Sinuiju ofrecieron la funcion artistica "El 27 de julio, dia de victoria, sera eterno por contar con el genial Comandante del Songun".
					
					  Ademas, los trabajadores de la ciudad de Wonsan pasaron esa fiesta con gran jubilo ofreciendo el recital de canciones creadas en el tiempo de guerra "Venceremos".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena el engano a la opinion publica
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena el engano a la opinion publica
 Pyongyang, 28 de julio (ATCC) -- Recientemente, los compinches del "Ministerio de Reunificacion" del Sur de Corea hicieron publica la "carta blanca de reunificacion de 2009", que justifica su politica de enfrentamiento fratricida de caracter antinacional y anti-reunificacion y tergiversa la situacion catastrofica de las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					  En vez de pedir disculpas por sus crimenes anti-reunificacion cometidos ante la nacion, los gobernantes surcoreanos enganan a la opinion publica hablando tan descaradamente de los supuestos "esfuerzos" y "ajuste". 
					
					Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 28 y continua:
					
					Todo el mundo sabe que adhiriendose a la politica hostil de EE.UU. a la RPDC desde el comienzo de su mandato, la banda de Lee Myung Bak lanzo la ofensiva total de enfrentamiento con aquella en virtud de su proyecto anti-reunificacion llamado la "desnuclearizacion, la apertura y 3,000 dolares" y llevo asi a la ruptura, de la noche a la manana, las relaciones N-S que se desarrollaban en sentido favorable a la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion de la nacion coreana.
					
					  Por muy elocuente que fuera, esa camarilla no podra justificar jamas su sucia trayectoria llena de crimenes anti-reunificacion ni encubrir su naturaleza de retador frontal a la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio.
					
					  Ella describio el ano 2008 como el "periodo de ajuste para el establecimiento de las nuevas relaciones Sur-Norte", lo cual no pasa de ser otro absurdo disparate.
					
					  Todos los hechos demuestran claramente que la horda de Lee no piensa siquiera en la mejora de las relaciones N-S ni en la reunificacion pacifica, sino persigue unicamente su ambicion criminal de calumniar y aplastar a los connacionales y de realizar la "reunificacion mediante la agresion al Norte" con la ayuda de su amo norteamericano.
